methods.name: public int exec(Binder target, FileDescriptor in, FileDescriptor out, FileDescriptor err, String[] args, ShellCallback callback, ResultReceiver resultReceiver)
public ResultReceiver adoptResultReceiver()
methods.comment:
* Adopt the ResultReceiver that was given to this shell command from it, taking
     * it over.  Primarily used to dispatch to another shell command.  Once called,
     * this shell command will no longer return its own result when done.

methods.name: public ParcelFileDescriptor openFileForSystem(String path, String mode)
methods.comment:
* Helper for just system services to ask the shell to open an output file.
     * @hide

methods.name: public ShellCallback getShellCallback()
methods.comment: * Return the {@link ShellCallback} for communicating back with the calling shell.
